record.title: ELECTING MINORITY MEMBERS TO CERTAIN STANDING COMMITTEES OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES
record.narrative:
ELECTING MINORITY MEMBERS TO CERTAIN STANDING COMMITTEES OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES -- (House of Representatives - October 10, 2007)

[Page: H11415]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, by direction of the House Republican Conference, I send to the desk a privileged resolution (H. Res. 722) and ask for its immediate consideration in the House.

record.narrative: The Clerk read the resolution, as follows:
Resolved, That the following named Members be, and are hereby, elected to the following standing committees of the House of Representatives:
COMMITTEE ON ARMED SERVICES: Mr. Lamborn.
COMMITTEE ON FOREIGN AFFAIRS: Mr. Blunt, to rank after Mr. Chabot.
A motion to reconsider was laid on the table.
